casebody.data:
Carolyn MILLER, Respondent
v.
Joanna Johnson HARRIS, James Harris and ARB International, Inc. d/b/a G.S.J. Properties, Inc., Petitioners No. 402 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 13, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 13th day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
